channel.title: September 11th jumpers
channel.description:
I remember hearing alot of commotion about how stupid the people who jumped out of the buildings were...
If i were in there, i might as well have done the same thing. Burning is one of the most painful ways to be killed... Falling to impact is probably one of the least.

item.title: September 11th jumpers
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

The one man who survived jumping from the Golden Gate Bridge regretted it at the moment he jumped.

~Z

item.title: September 11th jumpers
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:92, topic:199138”][quote author=Hiaburi link=topic=263774.msg2203530#msg2203530 date=1209070397]
Eh… random factual thought… Could a parachute open fast enough to make any difference for you at all while just jumping from the TT’s?
[/quote]

A wide area parachute like BASE jumpers use could easily, although BASE jumping does take some skill, so you’d probably have to train all the people too :D[/quote]

Haha. That’s funny. Everyone in the TT’s would know how to base jump. That’s badass.

item.title: September 11th jumpers
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

yea, i mean there were two stair cases and htey were side by side that that spot, I actually saw that on tv, they said that was the flaw, thats not my opinion thats what the people who investigated it or w/e said, but w/e

item.title: September 11th jumpers

item.description:

[/quote]

item.title: September 11th jumpers
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

lol, na, the way the TT’s were set up, the stairs were placed wrong in that one section of the building, i think, i know i heard that some where, well the plane didn’t take out the whole building, i just damaged it irreparably, and took out both stair cases, the stairs should of been out on the edges, not right in the middle, same with elevators, all right there in the middle.(hope I am remembering that diagram right lol)

Well hell, parachutes wouldn’t have been that bad of an idea lol.

Eh… random factual thought… Could a parachute open fast enough to make any difference for you at all while just jumping from the TT’s?

Read full topic

item.title: September 11th jumpers
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Hiaburi:

Hmm, my opinion, when the planes hit there was no way for the people up higher to get down, it was the trade towers fatal flaw

What can be done about that? Helicopters on the roof?

Read full topic

item.title: September 11th jumpers
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Hmm, my opinion, when the planes hit there was no way for the people up higher to get down, it was the trade towers fatal flaw, so i most likely, if above where the plane hit, try to find a way to jump down the stair case, but seeing as i am very weak, i probably would not be able to catch myself on a railing while falling, and die, or at least break my neck when i hit the surviving stairs. If there was no hope to get down the stairs then I would wait it out, and maybe try to ride a sturdy part of the tower down, probably get to the top floor if possible so not much fell on me. if all else fails, when it begins to collapse, i jump out a window.

Read full topic

I’m not even sure their shoes would survive that, even.

item.title: September 11th jumpers
item.dc:creator: @Thabest Thabest
item.description:
@Thabest wrote:

[quote=“bakatool, post:21, topic:199138”]oh yah i never answered this question,
i dont think i’d jump if I look down and I dont see anything but clouds im pretty sure i won’t survive it and probbly die from a heart attack before i hit the ground and since I want to live I’d try to run into the fire sure it will hurt but then again I could just roll around and extinguish the flames I might get a few burns but thats why you gotta run fast not to take as much damage to your body.

But yah if there is nothing u could do like all exits blocked or the only way out has been destoryed so its only me or the window… I would say I’d wait it out and see what happens next does the building collapse or not? rather wait and find out what happens ^^. Dying is the easy way out.[/quote]

We aren’t talking a few lousy flames. We are taking thousands of pounds of jet fuel burning. Your body would dissolve just being near it.

Read full topic

item.title: September 11th jumpers

item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

You supposedly have a heart attack or pass out before you hit.

item.title: September 11th jumpers
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

I would jump. G-force. 200 lbs (prob around what those people weigh) free falling 80 stories. Average story = about 10-15 feet. The g-forces created are enough to kill you, or knock you unconcious by the time you hit the ground. Your not gona feel the impact.

Read full topic

item.title: September 11th jumpers
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

On another topic

…but whats the point in doing it to feel sad?

Who said anything about being sad?

Read full topic

item.title: September 11th jumpers
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Empathy is when you put yourself in their shoes, I’ve been quite empathic during my life and it’s helped me steer away from saying hurtful things. You can be empathetic to/for anyone. Doesn’t been you feel sorry for the person.

Read full topic

item.title: September 11th jumpers
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Gotta Catch Them All, post:76, topic:199138”][quote author=magma828 link=topic=263774.msg2191871#msg2191871 date=1208398214]
Thats what I was thinking but everyone seems to be so serious about it…

As I said before, you probably don’t care about the people who died not related to you, so what difference does it make?
[/quote]

It is called empathy. Are you telling me that you have no feelings what so ever for the thousands of people who died and the thousands more people who are missing loved ones all because of some religious fanatics.[/quote]Empathy is another one of man’s illusions. I feel empaty for my close friends and family only. The rest doesn’t mean shit to me. Face it, people suck and deserve to die.

Read full topic

item.title: September 11th jumpers
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

Evan`:

So,you’re saying jumping hitting the ground at high velocity doesn’t hurt that much?

It wouldn’t hurt for the same reason a shotgun to the head wouldn’t hurt.

Besides, a lot of people would pass out before they hit the bottom.
